title: Unleashing the POWER of Gemini 2.0 Flash in n8n
description:
Join me on Saturday, December 28th, at 9:00 AM CDT for a livestream as a part of me kicking off my new mini series on my entire process for building AI agents!

During this stream, we'll build a super slick AI agent for GitHub using n8n, Gemini 2.0 Flash, and Supabase. And the best part is I'll also build a version compatible with the oTTomator Live Agent Studio (studio.ottomator.ai) and host it there for you to try out yourself during the livestream!

This is the prototype phase of my AI agent build process. Check out this video (publishing the 22nd at 7:00 PM CST) where I reveal my AI agent blueprint that this is a part of:

https://youtu.be/FGeB9w1ZeHE
